response.original_title: Indian Folk Tales: Animated Moral Stories
response.overview: A selfish man, a poor woodcutter and an unusually intelligent deer are just some of the characters in this collection of animated Indian folk tales that can help children learn how to make wise choices when faced with difficult decisions. The stories includes the generous keshav who learns the value of giving, a woodcutter who does not keep his promises, a miser who learns an important lesson and a man who finds a magic pumpkin.
response.title: Indian Folk Tales: Animated Moral Stories
